name: Soda Sort -Color Puzzle Games
description:
Soda Sort - Color Puzzle Game is a fun and addictive game.

Relaxation makes people happy. You can exercise your brain and make your time spent meaningful. Choose the difficulty as you like, enjoy life, and enjoy the game. Relieve stress and build happiness.

How to play:
-1 Touch the glass to pour soda from one glass to another.
-2 Make sure the glass has enough space before pouring the soda.
-3 Also, if you get stuck in a level, you can choose to go back to your last step to add more glasses or restart the level.

Features:
-Give your life a breather!
-Easy and fun to play!
-No WIFI requirements!
-Crisp and beautiful interface!
-Lots of levels and choose them by yourself!

Enjoy the Soda Sort Game, challenge yourself, and experience the free switching between tension and ease!
